page.title: 10Green Lane Junior School
page.content: Our school is thirty years old. It opened on April 1st 1955. The building is mainly of wood with very large windows and a flat roof. The grounds are open plan. We have a playground and a large grass area for sports facilities. Today there are 176 children between the ages of seven and eleven and seven staff including our headmaster. There is a secretary, two cleaning staff, six kitchen staff and three meals supervisors. Children learning to play musical instruments are taught by visiting teachers. In the evening our school is used by Caldicot Male Choir, the Severn Tunnel Band and the Gwent Carousel 'Jazz Band'.
